channel.title: Memory Scape V2 (New) (Old school)
channel.description:
Memory Scape V2 (Old School) (Ballscape upgraded) (Old school gameframe)
Client
[url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6vt930lk1j8rqx/MemoryV2.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6vt930lk1j8rqx/MemoryV2.jar?dl=1[/url]
Features: 1400 Experience rate 120 Max skill level All Skill cape emote 100% Fully working duel arena Party room with chest working Chaotic weapons Custom title system Many training areas Points system for everyone earn points by killing bosses, getting book drops and doing champion scrolls Pest control with damage counter All god wars bosses fully animated King of Caves Physco B***h 100% God swords, dragon claws, barrel chest anchor special attacks Many training areas Decent economy Forums with drops post with percentages for all monsters Clan chat Excellent combat and perfect switching Custom Npc's Bonus experience after completing slayer task
Pictures:
[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img661/7530/L0VD98.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img905/5705/lIdgJC.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img673/8643/fp9aGP.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/9559/OdXKJo.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img540/3582/uuqf1s.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img540/8741/kTh2Ch.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img661/9964/y5rDUb.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img540/4578/4LlFwO.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/8684/LhlJew.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/4268/UcPRR2.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img633/5157/U0OS7w.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img909/3968/FXOFVh.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img540/8626/1dX7vZ.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img673/8886/SJD5Xm.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img537/6305/Guq9lw.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img908/3659/6RByI6.png[/img] [img]http://imageshack.com/a/img538/5062/pJyHpi.png[/img]

item.title: Memory Scape V2 (New) (Old school)
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

[quote=“Mem0ry, post:9, topic:550052”][quote author=furyking50 link=topic=668930.msg4473655#msg4473655 date=1424538303]

Looks amazing
LOL still doesnt load…

I think i’ve finally fixed it lmao, does the client not load or did it say it was offline? i had accidently closed the server and forgot to reopen it if you could try again and let me know that’d be awesome, thanks

hmm, did you try the new download link? If not download the client again and use that one.
Yeah uhhh it doesn’t load like it acts like its about to load and it dowloads for like 1 second then says “Client Updated - please reload client” then after that it goes to Connection error - Retrying in (Seconds)

Hmm, did you redownload the client because i updated the download link to the client that works.

You sure because it still does the same thing like before…
[/quote]

ughh, you got team viewer so i could try to fix this, i would really appreciate it if you wouldn’t mind.[/quote]

Yes i do i’ll pm you?

Read full topic

item.title: Memory Scape V2 (New) (Old school)

item.description:
@Mem0ry wrote:

Memory Scape V2 (Old School) (Ballscape upgraded) (Old school gameframe)

Client

https://www.dropbox.com/s/v6vt930lk1j8rqx/MemoryV2.jar?dl=1

Features:
1400 Experience rate
120 Max skill level
All Skill cape emote 100%
Fully working duel arena
Party room with chest working
Chaotic weapons
Custom title system
Many training areas
Points system for everyone earn points by killing bosses, getting book drops and doing champion scrolls
Pest control with damage counter
All god wars bosses fully animated
King of Caves
Physco B***h
100% God swords, dragon claws, barrel chest anchor special attacks
Many training areas
Decent economy
Forums with drops post with percentages for all monsters
Clan chat
Excellent combat and perfect switching
Custom Npc’s
Bonus experience after completing slayer task
